_comment_width+height: Width and height of map, in tiles; 0 means infinite

cliff_settings.name: cliff
cliff_settings._cliff_elevation_0_comment: Elevation of first row of cliffs
_cliff_elevation_interval_comment: Elevation difference between successive rows of cliffs.
This is inversely proportional to 'frequency' in the map generation GUI. Specifically, when set from the GUI the value is 40 / frequency.
cliff_settings._richness_comment: Called 'cliff continuity' in the map generator GUI. 0 will result in no cliffs, 10 will make all cliff rows completely solid

_property_expression_names_comment: Elevation influences water and cliff placement.
Leave it blank to get 'normal' terrain.
_seed_comment: Use null for a random seed, number for a specific seed.
